channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: X、米音楽出版社協会が6月に提訴した著作権侵害訴訟の棄却を申請（Murray Stassen/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Murray Stassen / Music Business Worldwide:
X files for dismissal of a copyright lawsuit filed in June by the US National Music Publishers' Association over alleged infringements of ~1,700 works  —  Unlike rivals like Facebook, Instagram and TikTok, X - the Elon Musk-owned social media service formerly known as Twitter …

item.title: 以前はTweetDeckであったXProのユーザーが、サービスを利用するために有料壁に遭遇したと報告している。Xは7月3日、XProは「30日以内に」加入者限定の機能になると述べた（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Users of XPro, previously TweetDeck, report encountering paywalls to use the service; X said on July 3 that “in 30 days” XPro would be a subscriber-only feature  —  X, the social network formally known as Twitter, appears to be finally following through on its promise to make TweetDeck a paid service.

item.title: アマゾンがプライム会員向けのMusic Unlimitedを値上げ、個人プランは月額1ドル増の9.99ドル、ファミリープランは月額1ドル増の16.99ドルに（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Amazon hikes the price of Music Unlimited for Prime subscribers, up $1/month to $9.99 for individual plans and family plans up $1/month to $16.99  —  Amazon previously raised the prime of Amazon Music Unlimited for non-Prime members earlier this year.  —  Amazon Music Unlimited …

item.title: 2022年にRedboxを買収したChicken Soup for the Soul Entertainmentがコスト削減を進め、戦略検討委員会の設置を計画、CSSEの終値は47.3％減（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment, which acquired Redbox in 2022, is cutting costs and plans to form a strategic review committee; CSSE closed down 47.3%  —  A year after Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment (CSSE) purchased Redbox for $375 million, the company continues to be hit …

item.title: テレグラフ・メディア・グループによると、同メディアは目標の100万契約を達成し、その70％以上がデジタル版である。
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Telegraph Media Group says the outlet has reached its target of 1M subscriptions, 70%+ of them digital, and that 300K of its subscribers use its app every day  —  More than 70% of the subscriptions are digital.  —  Telegraph Media Group says it has hit its target of reaching one million subscriptions before the end of 2023.

item.title: TSGが20世紀フォックスと親会社ディズニーを提訴、スタジオがパートナーの犠牲の上に利益を隠し、Hulu、Disney+、そして自社株を高めるために取引を削減したと主張（Joe Flint/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
TSG sues Twentieth Century Fox and parent Disney, claiming the studio withheld profits and cut deals to boost Hulu, Disney+, and its stock, at partners' expense  —  TSG's lawsuit, which also names Disney unit Twentieth Century Fox, is similar to Scarlett Johansson's 2021 suit against company

item.title: ウィスコンシン州の地元ニュースサイトを破産させる恐れがある訴訟は、富裕層や権力者が報復のために名誉毀損法を利用する傾向を浮き彫りにしている（Jeremy W. Peters/New York Times）。
item.description:
Jeremy W. Peters / New York Times:
A lawsuit that threatens to bankrupt a Wisconsin local news website highlights a trend of wealthy and powerful people using defamation law for retribution  —  When a north-central Wisconsin news site reported that a businessman had uttered a homophobic slur, he sued, claiming defamation.

item.title: 調査ロシア人ジャーナリスト、エレーナ・コスチュチェンコとイリーナ・バブロヤンは、それぞれ2022年10月にミュンヘンとトビリシで毒殺された可能性が高い（Meduza.io）
item.description:
Meduza.io:
Investigation: Russian journalists Elena Kostyuchenko and Irina Babloyan were most likely poisoned in Munich and in Tbilisi, respectively, in October 2022  —  The independent outlet The Insider has published an investigation into a series of poisoning attacks targeting Russian journalists and activists in Europe.

item.title: 進歩的なローカルニュースグループ、クーリエ・ニュースルームは、今週中にネバダ州のニュースルームを開設し、数カ月以内にテキサス州とニューハンプシャー州にもニュースルームを開設する予定だ（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Progressive local news group Courier Newsroom plans to open a Nevada newsroom this week and one in Texas and another one in New Hampshire in the coming months  —  Courier Newsroom, a local news group with a progressive perspective, is launching a new newsroom in Nevada Tuesday …

item.title: Xは、Instagram、Facebook、Threads、Bluesky、Substack、NYT、Reuters、および他のサイトへのt.coリンクに5秒の遅延を追加した。
item.description:
Washington Post:
X added five-second delays, some now removed, on t.co links to Instagram, Facebook, Threads, Bluesky, Substack, the NYT, Reuters, and other sites Musk attacks  —  The site formerly known as Twitter has added a five-second delay when a user clicks on a shortened link to the New York Times …

item.title: NBCスポーツのアナリスト、マシュー・ベリーのファンタジー・スポーツ・メディア会社Fantasy Lifeが200万ドルを調達：ファンタジーライフは黒字、100万ドル以上の収益、35万人の購読者（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
NBC Sports analyst Matthew Berry's fantasy sports media firm Fantasy Life raised $2M; Berry: Fantasy Life is profitable, has $1M+ revenue, and 350K subscribers  —  Fantasy Life, the fantasy sports and sports betting media company founded by NBC Sports analyst Matthew Berry …

item.title: 提出書類：元WSJ記者ジェイ・ソロモン氏、同記者を解雇するためにハッカーを雇ったとする法律事務所デチャートに対する訴訟を自主的に棄却（Raphael Satter/Reuters）
item.description:
Raphael Satter / Reuters:
Filing: former WSJ reporter Jay Solomon voluntarily dismisses his lawsuit against law firm Dechert, which he said hired hackers to get him fired from the outlet  —  Former Wall Street Journal reporter Jay Solomon has ended his lawsuit against Dechert LLP and two of its former partners …

item.title: YouTubeがiOSとAndroidのYouTube Musicをアップデートし、アーティストが直接アップロードした30秒のクリップを縦に切り取った音楽発見フィード「Samples」を追加（Abner Li/9to5Google）
item.description:
Abner Li / 9to5Google:
YouTube updates YouTube Music on iOS and Android with Samples, a music discovery feed featuring vertically cropped, 30-second clips uploaded directly by artists  —  While there have been modernizations, YouTube's music streaming service has remained functionally and visually the same since its launch.

item.title: Rokuは、既存のABCとNBCのニュースチャンネルに加え、MrBeast、Saved by the Bell、30以上のローカルと国内のCBSとFoxニュースのチャンネルなどを追加した（Alex Cranz/The Verge）。
item.description:
Alex Cranz / The Verge:
Roku adds channels for MrBeast, Saved by the Bell, 30+ local and national CBS and Fox News channels, and more, on top of the existing ABC and NBC news channels  —  The Roku Channel is adding a whole mess of new linear channels, and while some are fun times like Murder, She Wrote and MrBeast …

item.title: アイオワ州のある学区では、学校図書館の図書を「年齢相応」とすることを義務づける州法を遵守するため、ChatGPTを使って「性行為」が描かれた図書を探した（Andrew Paul/Popular Science）。
item.description:
Andrew Paul / Popular Science:
To comply with a state law requiring that school library books be “age appropriate”, an Iowa school district used ChatGPT to find books depicting “a sex act”  —  Faced with new legislation, Iowa's Mason City Community School District asked ChatGPT if certain books 'contain …
